name: Klang
description: The Gear Pokémon. Spinning minigears are rotated at high speed and repeatedly fired away. It is dangerous if the gears don't return.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.description: This Pokémon boosts its attack and damage rolls by 2 if an ally also has a Plus or Minus ability

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: This Pokémon boosts its attack and damage rolls by 2 if an ally also has a Plus or Minus ability

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Other Pokémon's moves or abilities cannot lower this Pokémon stats.
